thread.section_title: Reservation Counter Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Reservation Counter | reservationcounter.com | 15 of 1177
thread.title: David Melzer
thread.title_full: Reservation Counter reviewed by David Melzer

author: David Melzer
title: David Melzer
text:
Your on-line is only lacking on explaining fully that "standard" means could end up with 1 single bed for 2 adults. Your staff was kind enough to let me cancel that and obtain a reservation that fit our needs.
Your online info and your staff are both excellent. Thank You.
